key_points: TikToker Haley Toumaian investigates Gabby Petito's disappearance by analyzing a Spotify playlist.
A two-minute clip by Toumaian compiles pertinent facts of the Petito case and discusses song lyrics added to Petito's Spotify.
Social media users have created a vast amount of content related to the case, using hashtags like #findGabby and #findGabbyPetito.
The case has sparked an open source investigation across social media, with some TikTok videos going viral.
Gabby Petito was on a cross-country trip with her fiance Brian Laundrie; she was reported missing on September 11.
Human remains matching Petito's description were found in Grand Teton National Park.
Bodycam footage from Moab, Utah, shows the couple in an apparent domestic dispute a month before Petito was reported missing.
The media's focus on Petito is partly due to her and Laundrie's attempts to be social media influencers, leading to significant online content.
The shift from #FindGabby to #JusticeForGabby occurred after the announcement of the discovery of a body matching Petito's description.
The effectiveness and impact of amateur internet investigations on the case are uncertain.
